```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r freq}
grades <- c("A", "D", "C", "D", "C", "C", "C", "C", "F", "B")
table(grades) # two ways to make a frequency table
xtabs(~grades)
```
```{r rel}
table(grades)/length(grades) # two ways to make a relative frequency table
prop.table(table(grades))
```
